challenge.title: Step 71
challenge.description: Use a class selector to target the .cat-whisker-left-middle element. Then move it into place with a position property set to absolute, a top of 127px, and a left of 52px.

tests.text: Your .cat-whisker-left-middle selector should have a position property set to absolute.
Your .cat-whisker-left-middle selector should have a top property set to 127px.
Your .cat-whisker-left-middle selector should have a left property set to 52px.
